keyword: calories in chick fil a cobb salad
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A Cobb Salad
meta_description: Discover calories in Chick-fil-A Cobb salad, including full nutrition breakdown with protein, fat, carbs, and serving tweaks for your meal planning.
assumptions: Standard serving with grilled chicken, includes mixed greens, corn, cheese, bacon, eggs, tomatoes, carrots; no dressing or croutons.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, portion size, and preparation; check Chick-fil-A app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Chick-fil-A Cobb salad with grilled chicken has ~540 kcal and ~42 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in Chick-fil-A Cobb salad without dressing?
faqs.a: About 540 kcal for the standard grilled chicken version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Chick-fil-A Cobb salad?
faqs.a: Approximately 42 g protein per serving with grilled chicken.

faqs.q: Does Chick-fil-A Cobb salad have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1440 mg due to bacon, cheese, and dressing options.

faqs.q: Calories in Chick-fil-A Cobb salad with fried chicken?
faqs.a: Roughly 640 kcal, about 100 kcal more than grilled.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Chick-fil-A Cobb salad?
faqs.a: Yes, about 29 g total carbs, including 7 g fiber from veggies and corn.
